content: change rnds 4 and 10 to round 4 knit round 10 knit this will result in a more open and lacy pattern @crochetedbybogusia 5 charts colorwork chart a @crochetedbybogusia 6 charts colorwork chart b there are long floats in the charts so i recommend using a technique called ladder-back jacquard to manage them i have marked spots on the chart where i think they should go red lines you can also knit your color work inside out this will keep the floats nice and long @crochetedbybogusia
